upgrade.name: upgrade
upgrade.title: CiviCRM Security Upgrade Needed
upgrade.message:
CiviCRM 5.9 has reached its end of life. Security updates are not provided anymore. Please upgrade to the latest stable release (5.66) or an extended security release (5.63).

Release history

5.10.0 was released on 2019-02-06. The latest patch revision is 5.10.4 (2019-02-22).
5.11.0 was released on 2019-03-06.
5.12.0 was released on 2019-04-04. The latest patch revision is 5.12.4 (2019-04-25).
